00034 CLexiconKeyChooser::CLexiconKeyChooser(CSwordModuleInfo *info, CSwordKey *key, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00035     : CKeyChooser(info, key, parent, name), m_key(0){
00036         
00037     m_module = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(info);
00038         
00039     //we use a layout because the key chooser should be resized to full size
00040     m_layout = new QHBoxLayout(this,QBoxLayout::LeftToRight);
00041     
00042     m_widget = new CKeyChooserWidget(m_module->entries(), false, this);
00043     m_widget->comboBox()->setMaximumWidth(300);
00044     
00045 //  if (info && info->isUnicode()){
00046 #warning implement reaction to font change in the optionsdialog here
00047 //    /*m_widget->comboBox()->*/setFont( CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::unicode) );
00048 //  }
00049 
00050     m_widget->setToolTips(TT_PRESENTER_ENTRY_COMBO,TT_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, TT_PRESENTER_SCROLL_BUTTON, TT_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_ENTRY);
00051     m_widget->setWhatsThis(WT_PRESENTER_ENTRY_COMBO,WT_PRESENTER_NEXT_ENTRY, WT_PRESENTER_SCROLL_BUTTON, WT_PRESENTER_PREVIOUS_ENTRY);
00052     
00053     m_layout->addWidget(m_widget,0,Qt::AlignLeft);
00054     
00055     connect(m_widget,SIGNAL(changed(int)),SLOT(activated(int)));
00056     connect(m_widget,SIGNAL(focusOut(int)),SLOT(activated(int)));
00057 
00058 //  setKey(key);
00059 }
00060 
00061 CSwordKey* const CLexiconKeyChooser::key(){
00062     return m_key;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void CLexiconKeyChooser::setKey(CSwordKey* key){    
00066     if (!(m_key = dynamic_cast<CSwordLDKey*>(key)))
00067         return;     
00068     m_widget->comboBox()->setCurrentItem(
00069         m_widget->comboBox()->listBox()->index(
00070             m_widget->comboBox()->listBox()->findItem( m_key->key() )));
00071 //  m_widget->adjustSize();
00072     emit keyChanged( m_key );
00073 }
00074 
00075 void CLexiconKeyChooser::activated(int index){
00076     const QString text = m_widget->comboBox()->text(index); 
00077     /*to prevent from eternal loop, because activated()is emitted again*/
00078     if (m_key->key() != text) {
00079         m_key->key(text);   
00080         setKey(m_key);
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00085 void CLexiconKeyChooser::refreshContent(){
00086 //  m_layout->invalidate(); 
00087     m_widget->reset(m_module->entries(), 0, true);  
00088 //  updateGeometry();   
00089 }
00090 
00092 void CLexiconKeyChooser::setModule( CSwordModuleInfo* module) {
00093     if (module && module != m_module && module->type() == CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::Lexicon) {
00094         m_module = dynamic_cast<CSwordLexiconModuleInfo*>(module);
00095         refreshContent();
00096     }
00097 }

00101 }
